bug.author: nan-wang
bug.summary: potential trouble-maker in the gpu support
bug.description:
Describe the bug self.model might not be overrided in the children classes in the BaseTorchEncoder. The same goes for self.exe in BasePaddleExecutor Describe how you solve it mark self.model as a private variable. <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
Environment 0.1.9 Screenshots
